resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105110</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105110</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206619</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Battle of Mill Springs: The Civil War Divides a Border State</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Schlacht der Tausendstel-Frühlinge: Der
Bürgerkrieg teilt einen Grenzstaat</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La bataille des ressorts de moulin : La 
guerre civile divise un Etat frontalier</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A batalha das molas do moinho: A guerra 
civil divide um estado de beira</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La battaglia delle molle del laminatoio: La 
guerra civile divide un bordo Dichiara</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η μάχη των ανοίξεων μύλων: Ο εμφύλιος πόλεμος 
διαιρεί ένα κράτος συνόρων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La batalla de los resortes del molino: La 
guerra civil divide un estado fronterizo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">focuses on a key Civil War battle to demonstrate how both the Union and the Confederacy attempted to win the loyalty of the citizens of Kentucky. The site presents maps, readings from Northern and Southern perspectives, and drawings and photographs about the battle, weather, and weapons.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Foki auf einem Schlüsselbürgerkrieg kämpfen, um
zu zeigen, wie der Anschluß und die Konföderation versuchten, die 
Loyalität der Bürger von Kentucky zu gewinnen. Die Site stellt
Karten, Messwerte von den Nord- und südlichen Perspektiven und 
Zeichnungen und Fotographien über die Schlacht, das Wetter und die 
Waffen dar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les foyers sur une guerre civile principale 
luttent pour démontrer comment l'union et la confédération ont 
essayé de gagner la fidélité des citoyens du Kentucky. Le 
site présente les cartes, lectures des perspectives nordiques et 
méridionales, et les schémas et les photographies au sujet de la 
bataille, survivent à, et des armes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">os focos em uma guerra civil chave battle para 
demonstrar como  a união e o confederacy tentaram ganhar a lealdade 
dos cidadãos de Kentucky. O local apresenta mapas, leituras dos
perspectives do norte e do sul, e desenhos e fotografias sobre a 
batalha, o tempo, e as armas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">i fuochi su una guerra civile chiave combattono 
per dimostrare come sia l'unione che il confederacy hanno tentato di 
vincere la lealtà dei cittadini del Kentucky. Il luogo presenta
i programmi, letture dalle prospettive nordiche e del sud ed 
illustrazioni e fotografie circa la battaglia, il tempo e le armi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εστίαση σε μια βασική μάχη εμφύλιου πολέμου για να 
καταδείξει πώς και η Ένωση και η συνομοσπονδία προσπάθησαν να 
κερδίσουν την πίστη των πολιτών του Κεντάκυ. Η περιοχή 
παρουσιάζει τους χάρτες, τις αναγνώσεις από τις βόρειες και 
νότιες προοπτικές, και τα σχέδια και τις φωτογραφίες για τη μάχη,
τον καιρό, και τα όπλα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">los focos en una guerra civil dominante luchan 
para demostrar cómo la unión y el confederacy procuraron ganar la 
lealtad de los ciudadanos de Kentucky. El sitio presenta 
correspondencias, las lecturas de perspectivas norteñas y 
meridionales, y los gráficos y las fotografías sobre la batalla, el 
tiempo, y las armas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206619</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105110</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/the-battle-of-mill-springs-the-civil-war-divides-a-border-state</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
